name: Ahmed Al-Rashid
review: CocoWangi has been our trusted partner for premium coconut oil imports. Their quality consistency and professional service make them stand out in the market.
reviewId: CocoWangi telah menjadi mitra terpercaya kami untuk impor minyak kelapa premium. Konsistensi kualitas dan layanan profesional mereka membuatnya menonjol di pasar.

name: Rajesh Patel
review: Excellent quality coconut charcoal briquettes! Our customers love the long burning time and clean burn. Highly recommended for hookah businesses.
reviewId: Briket arang kelapa berkualitas excellent! Pelanggan kami menyukai waktu bakar yang lama dan pembakaran yang bersih. Sangat direkomendasikan untuk bisnis hookah.

name: Li Wei Chen
review: Their cocopeat quality is outstanding for our hydroponic operations. Clean, low-salt content, and excellent water retention properties.
reviewId: Kualitas cocopeat mereka luar biasa untuk operasi hidroponik kami. Bersih, kandungan garam rendah, dan sifat retensi air yang excellent.

name: Maria Santos
review: Professional team with deep knowledge of coconut products. Their logistics support and documentation are always perfect.
reviewId: Tim profesional dengan pengetahuan mendalam tentang produk kelapa. Dukungan logistik dan dokumentasi mereka selalu sempurna.

name: Hassan Mohammed
review: Best copra supplier we've worked with. Consistent quality, competitive pricing, and reliable delivery schedules.
reviewId: Pemasok kopra terbaik yang pernah kami ajak bekerja sama. Kualitas konsisten, harga kompetitif, dan jadwal pengiriman yang dapat diandalkan.

name: John Mitchell
review: Their organic certifications and sustainable practices align perfectly with our values. Premium quality products every time.
reviewId: Sertifikasi organik dan praktik berkelanjutan mereka selaras sempurna dengan nilai-nilai kami. Produk berkualitas premium setiap saat.
